protocols.description: SmartSeq2 (Picelli S, Nat Methods. 2013, PubMed PMID: 24056875)

data_processing: Calculated expression values with rpkmforgenes.py (available at https://github.com/danielramskold/S3_species-specific_sequencing) with options -readcount -fulltranscript -mRNAnorm -rmnameoverlap -bothendceil and gene annotation for the UCSC genome browser Ensembl track
For the sample Bf37_mRNA_Fibroblast_Total_fraction we also used the  rpkmforgenes.py option -stranded
